    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_103133</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_103133</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Grille vierge pour le rapport des angles d'incidence et  de réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">Blank scale for the relationship of angles of incidence and reflection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unbelegte Skala für das Verhältnis von 
Einfallswinkeln und Reflexion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escala em branco para o relacionamento dos 
ângulos de incidência e de reflexão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scala in bianco per il rapporto degli angoli 
dell'incidenza e della riflessione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κενή κλίμακα για τη σχέση των γωνιών της πρόσπτωσης 
και της αντανάκλασης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escala en blanco para el lazo de ángulos de la 
incidencia y de la reflexión</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette grille vierge montre le rapport entre l'angle de réflexion et l'angle d'incidence des rayons de lumière.  Ceci peut être utilisé comme exercice de traçage.</string>
            <string language="en">This blank scale shows the relationship of angle of reflection and angle of incidence of light rays. This can be used as a plotting exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">l'angle d'incidence</string>
            <string language="en">incidence angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">miroir</string>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rapporteur</string>
            <string language="en">protractor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">traçage de  rayon</string>
            <string language="en">ray tracing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayons</string>
            <string language="en">rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">angle refléchi</string>
            <string language="en">reflected angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese unbelegte Skala zeigt das Verhältnis des 
Winkels der Reflexion und des Einfallswinkels der hellen Strahlen. 
Dieses kann als plottende Übung verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta escala em branco mostra o relacionamento do 
ângulo de reflexão e do ângulo de incidência de raios claros. 
Isto pode ser usado como um exercício traçando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa scala in bianco mostra il rapporto 
dell'angolo della riflessione e dell'angolo dell'incidenza dei raggi 
luminosi. Ciò può essere usata come esercitazione di 
tracciato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η κενή κλίμακα εμφανίζει τη σχέση της γωνίας 
της αντανάκλασης και της γωνίας της πρόσπτωσης των ελαφριών 
ακτίνων. Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση χάραξης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta escala en blanco muestra el lazo del ángulo
de la reflexión y del ángulo de la incidencia de rayos ligeros. 
Esto se puede utilizar como ejercicio que traza.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausdehnung Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Winkelmesser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlverfolgung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">reflektierter Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo da incidência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espelho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">prolongador</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">traçado do raio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">raios</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo refletido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">angolo di incidenza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">specchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">goniometro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tracciato del raggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">raggi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">angolo riflesso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γωνία επίπτωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μοιρογνωμόνιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επισήμανση ακτίνων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ακτίνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απεικονισμένη γωνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ángulo de la incidencia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espejo</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rayos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ángulo reflejado</string>
          </keyword>
